Text: happy monday night - peace and enjoy :-)
smbdownload...thanks for saying thanks on my 'The Rolling Stones - Get Yer Ya Ya's Out." You're welcome. (Better late than never) Cheers :)
@ smb & vtwin,with the quality of the uploads that you both put out,isnÂ´t it time that the powers that be,make you both master uploaders(a gold skull would be appropriate!)Thank you both.
zoso5150...I'll second that nomination! But unfortunately, I'm still working on getting a thanks. Thank you to you for letting me know that I'm not invisible. Cheers, my man :)

ditto brother - I think most of us 'share' because we have a desire to share 'our' music with others - to expose others to sounds they might not have heard or maybe not heard in a while...at least thats why I do - a simple thanks from time to time is all I seek - as you seem to be 'one of the good guys' also...thanks - peace
